Name: Missile Launch
Text: Draw 3 cards. If you are playing on a KAMINO map, draw 4 cards instead.

Name: Rocket Retreat
Text: After attacking, you may move Jango to any empty space.

Name: Wrist Cable
Text: Deal 2 damage to a character that Jango can attack. The controlling player gets 1 less action on their next turn.

Name: Fire Up the Jetpack
Text: You may move Jango to any empty space. Playing this card does not count as an action.

Name: Beskar Bulwark
Text: If Jango is adjacent to an ally being attacked, you may play this card to defend them. Any excess damage is dealt to Jango.

Name: Flamethrower
Text: Deal 3 damage to all enemies within 2 spaces of Jango. You may then move each of them up to 2 spaces.

Name: Sniper Shot
Text: *If Zam does damage with this attack, the attack value is 6 instead of 3.

Name: Assassination
Text: After attacking, you may move Zam to any empty space.

Name: Shape Match
Text: If the opponent played a card, the attack and defend values of this card are equal to those of the opponent's card.

Name: Friend Shaped
Text: Zam cannot be targeted by enemy attacks until her next attack. You may move Zam up to 3 spaces.

Name: Mabari Outmanoeuvre
Text: Draw a card.

Name: Explosive Polymer
Text: A character adjacent to Zam takes 4 damage. If this is Zam's first attack after using Friend Shaped, they take 10 damage instead.

Name: Force Control
Text: After attacking, move Obi-Wan and the defending character up to 3 spaces each.

Name: The High Ground
Text: After attacking, you may move Obi-Wan up to 6 spaces.

Name: I Don't Think So
Text: Draw a card.

Name: Force Balance
Text: All players discard their hands. Each player draws 3 new cards.

Name: Force Healing
Text: Any character adjacent to Obi-Wan recovers 2 damage.

Name: Jedi Mind Trick
Text: Take any card from your discard pile and put that card in your hand.

Name: Force Speed
Text: Move Obi-Wan up to 6 spaces, then draw a card.

Name: Justice
Text: *If Leia has been destroyed, the attack value of this card is 10.

Name: Justice
Text: *If an ally has been destroyed, the attack value of this card is 10.

Name: I Will Not Fight You
Text: Choose an opponent and reveal your hands to each other. Both of you must discard all cards with an attack value greater than 1.

Name: Children of the Force
Text: Move Luke and Leia up to 6 spaces each. Draw 2 cards.

Name: Inner Conflict
Text: Move Luke up to 5 spaces. You may put 1 card from your hand on top of your draw pile. If you do, Luke recovers 4 damage.

Name: Natural Force Talent
Text: Draw 2 cards.

Name: Foresight
Text: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Put one in your hand and place the rest back on top of your deck in any order.

Name: Force Crush
Text: *If Luke does damage with this attack, the controlling player gets 1 less action on their next turn.

Name: There is Another
Text: Draw a card.

Name: Luke's in Trouble
Text: If Leia is adjacent to Luke, he recovers 4 damage. If Luke has been destroyed, Leia recovers 4 damage.

Name: You're My Only Hope
Text: Leia may switch places with any allied character. Then, draw a card.

Name: Hit and Run
Text: After attacking, you may move Leia up to 5 spaces.

Name: Hidden Plans
Text: Put the bottom card of your draw pile into your hand.

Name: Gut Feeling
Text: Discard a card to play the top card from your discard pile.

Name: Size Matters Not
Text: Draw a card.

Name: Force Rebound
Text: Yoda receives no damage from the attack. Instead, the attacker receives damage equal to the attack value on the opponent's card.

Name: Serenity
Text: Draw a card.

Name: Force Lift
Text: Turn any character adjacent to Yoda on its side. This character cannot move, attack, or defend until any player discards 3 cards to stand it back up.

Name: Force Push
Text: Move any character adjacent to Yoda to any empty space. That character receives 3 damage.

Name: Insight
Text: Look at any opponent's hand, then choose one of their cards to discard.

Name: Flurry
Text: Playing this card does not count as an action.

Name: Force Lightning
Text: Choose any character. That character receives 3 damage. The controlling player must discard a card at random.

Name: Let Go Of Your Hatred
Text: Choose an opponent. That opponent discards 2 cards of their choice.

Name: You Will Die
Text: Choose an opponent to reveal their hand. For every 2 cards in their hand, they must choose and discard a card.

Name: Meditation
Text: Choose an opponent. They cannot draw cards their next turn. Palpatine recovers 4 damage.

Name: Future Foreseen
Text: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Put one in your hand and place the rest back on top of your deck in any order.

Name: Force Lightning
Text: Choose any character. That character receives 3 damage. The controlling player gets 1 less action on their next turn.

Name: Sith Fury
Text: If the target is destroyed, playing this card does not count as an action.

Name: UNLIMITED POWER
Text: *Discard up to 3 Sidious cards. The attack value of this card is increased by 1 for each card discarded.

Name: Meditation
Text: Palpatine recovers 4 damage. Draw a card.

Name: Dark Aura
Text: Enemy characters within 2 spaces of Palpatine get 1 less action and move 2 less space next turn.

Name: Masterful Fighting
Text: Draw a card.

Name: Battlemind
Text: *The attack and defence values of this card are equal to the number of cards in your hand after this card is played.

Name: Wisdom
Text: Move Mace up to 5 spaces, then draw a card.

Name: Whirlwind Attack
Text: Mace does 4 damage to all opponent characters he can attack.

Name: Gambler's Luck
Text: *If Han does damage with this attack, choose an opponent to discard a card at random.

Name: Heroic Retreat
Text: After attacking, you may move Han up to 5 spaces.

Name: Never Tell Me The Odds
Text: Han does 3 damage to all opponent characters he can attack. You may then shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile.

Name: Gambler's Luck
Text: Roll the movement die. The attack value of this card is increased by the number rolled if it's a single move, and decreased if it's an all move.

Name: Daring Rescue
Text: Move an allied character adjacent to Han. Han or that character may recover up to 3 damage.

Name: Smuggler's Grit
Text: *If the attack would destroy Han, the attack value of that card is 0.

Name: Bowcaster
Text: Draw a card.

Name: It's Not Wise
Text: Move any character adjacent to Chewbacca up to 6 spaces. That character receives 3 damage.

Name: Wookiee Endurance
Text: Chewbacca recovers 3 damage. Move Chewbacca up to 5 spaces.

Name: Wookiee Instincts
Text: Search your deck for the Bowcaster card. If it is in your deck, place it in your hand. Reshuffle your deck.

Name: Enraged Block
Text: If Chewbacca receives any damage from the attack, you may shuffle your discard pile into your deck.

Name: You Disappoint Me
Text: Draw a card.

Name: Force Push
Text: Move any character adjacent to Dooku to any empty space. That character receives 1 damage.

Name: Give Orders
Text: Move Dooku and both Super Battle Droids up to 4 spaces each.

Name: Sith Lightning
Text: Choose an opponent to discard 2 cards at random.

Name: Twice the Pride
Text: Draw 3 cards.

Name: Sith Lightning
Text: Choose any character. That character receives 3 damage. Then move that character up to 4 spaces.

Name: Brilliant Bladework
Text: If Dooku does not do damage with this card, shuffle it back into your draw pile.

Name: All Too Easy
Text: *If this card is not blocked, the target takes 20 damage instead of 7.

Name: Dark Side Drain
Text: If Vader does damage with this card, he recovers the amount of damage dealt.

Name: Throw Debris
Text: Choose any character. That character receives 4 damage.

Name: Wrath
Text: Choose an opponent. Each of their characters receives 2 damage.

Name: Choke
Text: Choose any minor character. That character receives 6 damage.

Name: Your Skills Are Not Complete
Text: Choose any opponent. They must reveal their hand and discard all Special cards.

Name: Force Block
Text: *If the attacker is not adjacent to Vader, Vader receives no damage from the attack.

Name: Dark Side Loss
Text: *The attack value of this card is increased by 2 for each ally that has been destroyed.

Name: Sith Speed
Text: Playing this card does not count as an action.

Name: Super Sith Speed
Text: Playing this card does not count as an action.

Name: Athletic Surge
Text: After attacking, move Darth Maul up to 6 spaces.

Name: Martial defence
Text: Draw a card.

Name: Blinding Surge
Text: *After taking damage from the attack, Darth Maul does 3 damage to the attacker.

Name: Kyber Dart
Text: *If this attack destroys the target, draw 3 cards.

Name: Deadly Aim
Text: Draw 2 cards.

Name: Rocket Retreat
Text: After attacking, you may move Boba Fett to any empty space.

Name: Wrist Cable
Text: Deal 2 damage to a character that Boba Fett can attack. The controlling player gets 1 less action on their next turn.

Name: Missile Blast
Text: Deal 4 damage to a character that Boba Fett can attack. All characters adjacent to that character also receive 4 damage.

Name: Desperate Shot
Text: *If you do not destroy the defending character with this card, destroy Greedo.

Name: Sudden Arrival
Text: Move Greedo adjacent to any character. Then Greedo does 1 damage to all characters he can attack. Playing this card does not count as an action.

Name: Going Somewhere?
Text: Choose any character adjacent to Greedo. That character cannot move until your next turn uness their player discards 3 cards.

Name: Looking Forward To This
Text: *Play this card face up in front of you without attacking as one action. On any turn after this one, you may use an action to attack with this card.

Name: Slow and Steady
Text: You may shuffle Looking Forward To This into your deck.

Name: Quick Dodge
Text: *If the attack would destroy Greedo if unblocked, the defence value of this card is 0.

Name: Anger
Text: After attacking, discard every card in your hand except one card.

Name: Counterattack
Text: Anakin receives no damage from the attack. Instead, the attacker receives 1 damage.

Name: Wrath
Text: You may move Anakin adjacent to any minor character. That character receives 7 damage.

Name: Calm
Text: Move Anakin up to 8 spaces. If this was the last card in your hand, draw up to 5 cards.

Name: Recklessness
Text: Anakin may receive 3 damage to increase the attack value of this card by 3.

Name: Precise Shot
Text: After attacking, you may discard a card to draw a card.

Name: Aggressive Negotiations
Text: After attacking, move Padmé up to 6 spaces.

Name: Protection
Text: If Anakin is alive, Padmé recovers 4 damage. If Anakin has been destroyed, Padmé recovers 2 damage.

Name: Decoy
Text: *Padmé receives no damage from the attack. You may move Padmé to any empty space.

Name: Diplomacy
Text: Choose any character. Padmé cannot be attacked by the controlling player until your next turn.

Name: Queen's Orders
Text: Move up to 2 allied characters up to 4 spaces each. Draw a card.

Name: Will of the Force
Text: *If you have fewer than 3 cards in your hand, the attack value of this card is 8. After attacking, draw cards until you have 3 cards in your hand.

Name: The Living Force
Text: Qui-Gon recovers 3 damage. If you have fewer than 3 cards in your hand, until the end of your next turn, anytime Qui-Gon receives damage from an attack card, reduce that damage by 3. Draw cards until you have 3 cards in your hand.

Name: Ataru Master
Text: Move Qui-Gon up to 6 spaces. If you have fewer than 3 cards in your hand, until the end of your next turn, anytime Qui-Gon receives damage from an attack card, reduce that damage by 3. Draw cards until you have 3 cards in your hand.

Name: Battle Precognition
Text: If you have fewer than 3 cards in your hand, look at the top 4 cards of your draw pile. Discard up to 2 of them and put the rest back on top of your draw pile in any order. After attacking, draw cards until you have 3 cards in your hand.

Name: Qui-Gon's Gamble
Text: Play immediately after a die is rolled. You may place that die on any side.

Name: Force Leap
Text: Move Qui-Gon up to 6 spaces. Qui-Gon may move over any obstacles or characters, but must end on an empty space.

Name: Ataru Master
Text: After attacking, move Qui-Gon up to 6 spaces. You have 1 fewer action on your next turn.

Name: Battle Meditation
Text: Qui-Gon recovers 2 damage. Draw a card. You have 1 more action on your next turn.

Name: One With The Force
Text: Play anytime after Qui-Gon has been destroyed. Place Qui-Gon back in play. He is now untargetable, but his cards cost one extra action.

Name: Apt Pupil
Text: You may play any card from your hand as if it were Obi-Wan's. The requirements of the original card must still be met.

Name: Force Leap
Text: Move Obi-Wan up to 6 spaces. Obi-Wan may move over any obstacles or characters, but must end on an empty space.

Name: Obi-Wan's Fury
Text: *If an ally has been destroyed, the attack value of this card is doubled, and playing this card does not count as an action.

Name: Leaping Slash
Text: Play this card face up. You may move Obi-Wan up to 5 spaces, over any obstacles or characters, but must end on an empty space, before attacking.

Name: Martial Strike
Text: If this card is played after another of Obi-Wan's attacks, playing this card does not count as an action.

Name: Jedi Hunter
Text: *The attack value of this card is multiplied by the number of arms Grievous currently has.

Name: General's Orders
Text: Move Grievous and his minor characters up to 5 spaces each. Draw a card.

Name: Cowardly Defence
Text: Grievous may exchange spaces with any of his minor characters. That minor character becomes the target of the attack and takes full damage.

Name: Twirling Saber Charge
Text: Grievous may move up to 3 spaces in a straight line. All characters adjacent to Grievous at any time during this movement take 3 damage.

Name: Unorthodox Attack
Text: If this attack is defended, the defence value of of that card is divided by 2, rounded down.

Name: You Lose, Jedi
Text: After attacking, move Grievous to any empty space.

Name: Our Moment of Triumph
Text: If this attack did not damage the defending character, destroy all of Tarkin's minor characters.

Name: Fire When Ready
Text: All of Tarkin's minor characters deal 2 damage to all enemy characters they can attack

Name: Reinforcements
Text: Place all of Tarkin's destroyed minor characters back in play on any empty space and at full health.

Name: Military Strategist
Text: Move Tarkin and his allied characters up to 5 spaces each. Draw a card.

Name: All Sections on Alert
Text: Choose an opponent. That opponent must discard 2 cards at random. Then, if any allied minor characters can attack their characters, they must choose and discard 1 additional card.

Name: Imperial Medic
Text: Tarkin recovers up to 3 damage. Draw 2 cards.

Name: Gloat
Text: If this card is defended, the value of the defence card is doubled.

Name: Patience
Text: Playing this card does not count as an action. If a defence card was played, the opponent controlling the attacked character must discard a card at random.

Name: Deadly Precision
Text: Name a numerical value. The opponent controlling the attacked character must choose and discard a card with a matching attack or defence value, or reveal a hand containing no such card.

Name: Pain Can Break Anyone
Text: If this card does damage, look at the hand of the opponent controlling the attacked character, and choose a card belonging to the attacked character. The opponent must discard that card.

Name: So Predictable
Text: *Predict the attack value of the attack played. If you are correct, cancel any effects of that card, ignore its attack value, and the attacking character receives 2 damage.

Name: Worthy of My Time
Text: Place this card next to the attacking character's Character Chart. Double the attack value of the next Basic Combat card the Inquisitor uses to attack that character.

Name: Hunt Them Down
Text: Move the Inquisitor and Stormtroopers each up to 6 spaces. If either ends movement adjacent to an enemy major character, the opponent controlling that character must reveal their hand.

Name: Spinning Saber Throw
Text: *This card can be used to attack any character the Grand Inquisitor could attack at range.

Name: More Frightening Than Death
Text: After combat resolves, the Grand Inquisitor takes 3 damage.

Name: Spinning Saber
Text: *After cards are revealed, you may discard a basic Grand Inquisitor card to add its attack and defence values to this card's.

Name: Force Push
Text: Move any character adjacent to the Grand Inquisitor to any empty space. That character receives 1 damage.

Name: Temple Archives
Text: Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one in your hand and place the other back on top of your deck.

Name: Untamed Power
Text: Discard a card from your hand. Then, remove a card in your discard pile from play.

Name: Let the Past Die
Text: If this card does damage, remove a card in the defending player's discard pile from the game.

Name: What I Have To Do
Text: *Add 2 to the attack value of this card for each card removed from the game due to Kylo's card effects.

Name: Force Connection
Text: If the attacking character does damage, Kylo and the attacking/defending character may attack each other from anywhere on the board for the rest of the game.

Name: Energy Freeze
Text: You may discard a Basic Combat card. If you do, the attacking character takes damage equal to the defence value of the discarded card.

Name: Obsession
Text: Move Kylo up to 5 spaces. If this card is removed from the game, Kylo recovers 2 damage.

Name: Sith Artefacts
Text: Draw 3 cards, then discard a card. If this card is removed from the game, you may draw a card.
